tree.name: De'Aaron Fox
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: SAS sent Collins/Jones/2025 CHI 1st to CHI; SAS sent Cissoko + 6 picks to SAC; CHI sent LaVine + 2028 2nd to SAC; SAC sent Huerter to CHI; SAC sent Fox + McLaughlin to SAS
tree.note: All-Star guard originally drafted 5th overall by Sacramento in 2017

assetsGivenUp.name: Zach Collins
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Spurs acquired Collins from Trail Blazers in sign-and-trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Center originally drafted 10th overall by Portland in 2017

assetsGivenUp.name: Al-Farouq Aminu
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: CHI sent Aminu, Thaddeus Young, 2025 1st, 2022 2nd (LAL), 2025 2nd (CHI) to SAS for DeMar DeRozan S&T
assetsGivenUp.note: Salary filler acquired from Chicago in DeMar DeRozan sign-and-trade. Waived Oct 2021.

assetsGivenUp.name: DeMar DeRozan
assetsGivenUp.note: All-Star guard acquired from Toronto in Kawhi Leonard trade. Sent to CHI in S&T.

assetsGivenUp.name: Tre Jones
assetsGivenUp.note: Point guard drafted 41st overall from Duke

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 CHI 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Chicago's own 2025 1st round pick, acquired from Bulls in DeMar DeRozan sign-and-trade. Sent back to Chicago in this deal.

assetsGivenUp.name: DeMar DeRozan
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Spurs acquired DeRozan + Poeltl from Raptors for Leonard + Green
assetsGivenUp.note: All-Star guard originally drafted 9th overall by Toronto in 2009

assetsGivenUp.note: Chicago's own 2025 2nd round pick, sent to Sacramento

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally a conditional 2025 CHO 1st round pick owed to SAC that did not convey; converted to this 2026 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.note: San Antonio's own 2027 first round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally a conditional 2025 CHO 1st round pick owed to SAC that did not convey; converted to this 2027 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 DEN 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Denver's 2028 2nd round pick (conditional), sent to Sacramento

assetsGivenUp.name: 2031 MIN 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Minnesota's 2031 1st round pick, acquired from Timberwolves in Rob Dillingham draft-night trade (June 26, 2024)

assetsGivenUp.name: Rob Dillingham
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard drafted 8th overall, immediately traded to Minnesota for 2030 swap + 2031 1st
